channel.title: Setting up the server
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm just starting to develop my first server and have been following this tutorial to try and get my server up and running with No-IP and Portforwarding set up (Or so I thought?): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html
I can personally, gain access to the server through the client but can't get onto through the webclient on moparisthebest.com despite having the port (43594) set up and the correct IP.
I am currently using the "No-Name" server and client and have completed The Soul's "How to Start a Server" tutorial, yet I still can't get access from other players or myself through moparscape's webclient. Where am I going wrong? I just get the "Error connecting to server". If I'm running off the no-name client, I can access it, but not through moparscape and neither can anyone else.
Any help, please?

item.title: Setting up the server
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

because then I can help you, it lets me use remote control access to your computer while your on monitoring it so I could edit the files and make it work, btw already told u what files to edit it from either the gui.java or client.java and search for serverip or server then compile it no need for me to download it

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up the server
item.dc:creator: @Wrath1 Wrath.
item.description:
@Wrath1 wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:4, topic:423853”]yea gui.java or client.java and search for serverip or server and change it yours! if they cant login you didnt portforward right or do something right &
if you still need help I recommend downloading that software (TEAMVIEWER) its free to use[/quote]

Why do you need to use teamviewer with me? Not like it’s going to help much…

Basically, I’ve set up portforward by going typing my ip into browser adding 43594:43594 and all that, registered my server on no-ip.com and have checked the box. Why don’t you download the no-name server and client and tell me that way what i need to do from here? In my server folder, I already changed it so it shows up as [EXTERNAL IP]:[PORT] but still can only gain access from the no-name client, possibly because its more advanced than the moparscape one. I just need to know how I can edit this client, so others can also use it to play my server.

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up the server
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

yea gui.java or client.java and search for serverip or server and change it yours! if they cant login you didnt portforward right or do something right &
if you still need help I recommend downloading that software (TEAMVIEWER) its free to use
http://teamviewer.com/en/index.aspx

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up the server
item.dc:creator: @Wrath1 Wrath.
item.description:
@Wrath1 wrote:

ultimatepkvillage:

ill help you got teamviewer?

Nope I don’t. For my client, how do I make it so if I sent it to another person they can open it up and just play? Do I have to open any particular file?

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up the server
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

ill help you got teamviewer?

Read full topic
